text: Daniele Contrini (born 15 August 1974 in Gardone Val Trompia) is an Italian racing cyclist. His major victory was the 2nd stage in the 2006 Tour de Suisse in Einsiedeln. == Palmares == * Tour of Georgia - 1 stage (2007) * Tour de Suisse - 1 stage (2006) * Route Adelié (2005) * Tour de Picardie - 1 stage (2005) * Sachsen Tour - 1 stage (2003) * National Time Trial Championship ** 2nd (2000) ** 3rd (2001) * GP KRKA (1998) * Four Days of Dunkirk ** 1 stage & 3rd Final (1997) ** Mountains Classification (2000) * Olympia's Tour - 1 stage (1997) * European Road U23 Championship - 2nd (1996) ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Tour de Suisse stage winners Category:People from the Province of Brescia Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists
title: Daniele Contrini
